title: Page 20
content:
Then 
 Over the mountains, 
 And over the dells, 
 The world 
 Set to ringing, 
 With sweet 
 Christmas bells; 
 And gifts 
 And kind wishes, 
 Went flying 
 around, 
 As fast as the 
 flakes 
 When they fell 
 To the ground.

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
